title: BLES01649-[Crysis3][PS3]
description:
Game            Crysis 3
Developer(s)	Crytek Frankfurt
                Crytek UK
Publisher(s)	Electronic Arts
Engine	        CryEngine 3
Released	NA February 19, 2013
                AU February 21, 2013
                EU February 21, 2013
                UK February 22, 2013
                JP March 7, 2013                  
Genre	        First-person shooter
Mode(s)	        Single-player, multiplayer
CONSOLE         PS3
GAME REGION     BLES01649 (EUR)
---------------------------------------------------
This Backup Game is Copied & Uploaded By  MaSsUp . 
The Game is tested On Rogero 4.50 v1.0 .
---------------------------------------------------
How To Install : 

1. Copy The File ( BLES01649-[Crysis3] ) into USB Drive (Fat32) .
2. Connect The USB Drive into "PS3" and Launch "Multiman".
3. Open "File manager /mmOS" or just press "Start+Select" at the same time.
4. Copy The Game Folder (BLES01649-[Crysis3]) from : "PS3 Root = dev_usb000" .
5. Paste the copied folder into this Location : "PS3 Root = dev_hdd0 = Games" .
---------------------------------------------------
Note : this Game doesn't require "BD Mirror" setting to work .

To enable "BD Mirror" Setting : 

1. Launch "Multiman" .
2. Navigate to the game you want to enable "BD Mirror" then press "Square".
3. Under The "Game Cover" Navigate to "BD Mirror" and Press "X" .
4. Launch the game and Enjoy.
